After teasing his first solo album in close to a decade, Skrillex joined forces with Fred again.. and Flowdan to release the much anticipated new track Rumble yesterday, January 4.

articles.title: Molly-Mae Hague praised as she shows stretch marks after 'trying everything to stop them' - The Mirror
articles.description: Love Island's Molly-Mae Hague has revealed she tried every product to stop her getting stretch marks during her pregnancy but admits they are never going to go
articles.content:
Pregnant Molly-Mae Hague has been praised by fans after candidly showing off her stretch marks on camera.
